amendatorysection.catchline: Certificate of licensure; required; violation; injunction.
amendatorysection.para: No person shall practice as a professional landscape architect or in any manner designate himself or herself as a professional landscape architect unless he or she has been issued a certificate of licensure pursuant to the Professional Landscape Architects Act. If such person does practice or attempt to practice under the designation of professional landscape architect, he or she may be restrained under permanent injunction.
